data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
Throw-in for Man Utd in their own half.
In the minute 1, Man Utd have a goal kick.
Southampton to take a throw-in in Man Utd territory.
Jon Moss awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 3, Throw-in Man Utd.
Goal kick for Southampton at St. Mary's Stadium.
Ball safe as Southampton is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 5, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Jon Moss awards Southampton a goal kick.
Jon Moss signals a Man Utd throw-in in Southampton's half.
In the minute 6, Can Man Utd get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Southampton's half?
Man Utd's Mason Greenwood gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Southampton goal kick.
In the minute 8, Throw-in for Southampton at St. Mary's Stadium.
Throw-in for Southampton in the half of Man Utd.
Jon Moss signals a free kick to Man Utd in their own half.
In the minute 12, Man Utd have a dangerous throw-in.
In Southampton a free kick has been awarded the away team.
The match at St. Mary's Stadium has been interrupted briefly for a check on Bruno Fernandes, who is down injured.
Man Utd's Bruno Fernandes is back in action after a slight knock.
In Southampton, Bruno Fernandes of Man Utd is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 16, James Ward-Prowse (Southampton) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 17, Man Utd have been awarded a corner by Jon Moss.
Corner awarded to Man Utd.
Jon Moss signals a Man Utd throw-in in Southampton's half.
In the minute 19, Free kick for Man Utd in the half of Southampton.
Southampton awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick Southampton.
In the minute 23, Southampton have been awarded a corner by Jon Moss.
Goal! Southampton have taken a 1-0 lead courtesy of a header from Jan Bednarek.
That's a fine assist from James Ward-Prowse.
In the minute 25, Throw-in for Southampton in the half of Man Utd.
Throw-in Man Utd.
Jon Moss signals a free kick to Man Utd.
In the minute 27, Throw-in for Man Utd at St. Mary's Stadium.
Important block from the Man Utd defence as Kyle Walker-Peters fires in a strike for Southampton.
Corner awarded to Southampton.
In the minute 29, Southampton have been awarded a corner by Jon Moss.
Man Utd awarded a free kick in their own half.
Jon Moss awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 30, Free kick Southampton.
Mason Greenwood gets his shot on target but fails to score for Man Utd.
In Southampton Man Utd drive forward through Bruno Fernandes. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 31, Throw-in high up the field for Man Utd in Southampton.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Southampton in their own half.
In the minute 32, Jon Moss signals a free kick to Southampton just outside Man Utd's area.
Goal! James Ward-Prowse extends Southampton's lead to 2-0 in Southampton with a header.
Southampton awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 35, Southampton drives forward and Moussa Djenepo gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Southampton.
Attention is being given to Man Utdâ€™s David De Gea and play has been suspended briefly.
In the minute 37, David De Gea returns to the field for Man Utd after picking up a slight injury.
Jon Moss signals a free kick to Man Utd in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Southampton.
In the minute 42, Corner awarded to Man Utd.
Man Utd awarded a free kick in their own half.
Corner awarded to Man Utd.
In the minute 45, Man Utd's Fred gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Southampton defender.
Jon Moss signals a free kick to Southampton.
The 1st half is prolonged by 2 minutes of added time.
In the minute 45, Can Southampton get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Man Utd's half?
The first-half has come to a close in Southampton.
The second-half is underway in Southampton.
In the minute 46, Dean Henderson is replacing David De Gea for Man Utd at St. Mary's Stadium.
Edinson Cavani is on a sub for Mason Greenwood for Man Utd.
Southampton's Theo Walcott is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 49, Throw-in for Southampton close to the penalty box.
Southampton pushes forward through Theo Walcott, whose finish on goal is saved.
In Southampton a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 51, Southampton to take a throw-in in Man Utd territory.
Southampton to take a throw-in in Man Utd territory.
Man Utd's Marcus Rashford gets in a shot on goal at St. Mary's Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 54, Ball safe as Southampton is awarded a throw-in in their half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Man Utd push forward at St. Mary's Stadium and Edinson Cavani gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Southampton defence.
In the minute 57, Jan Bednarek is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Man Utd have been awarded a corner by Jon Moss.
Jon Moss signals a Man Utd throw-in in Southampton's half.
Southamptonâ€™s Jan Bednarek is on his feet again at St. Mary's Stadium.
Bruno Fernandes keeps the away team in the match by reducing the deficit to 2-1.
In the minute 59, Edinson Cavani with an assist there.
In the minute 61, Goal kick for Man Utd at St. Mary's Stadium.
Throw-in for Southampton in the half of Man Utd.
Can Southampton get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Man Utd's half?
In the minute 63, In Southampton Southampton attack through Moussa Djenepo. The finish is off target, however.
Jon Moss awards Man Utd a goal kick.
Can Man Utd get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Southampton's half?
In the minute 65, Bruno Fernandes of Man Utd smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Throw-in for Southampton in their own half.
Corner awarded to Southampton.
In the minute 67, Southampton's Stuart Armstrong gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Man Utd defender.
Southampton have been awarded a corner by Jon Moss.
In Southampton, Ryan Bertrand of Southampton is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 68, Jon Moss signals a throw-in for Man Utd, close to Southampton's area.
Edinson Cavani (Man Utd) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Ball goes out of play for a Southampton goal kick.
In the minute 71, Corner awarded to Man Utd.
Throw-in for Southampton at St. Mary's Stadium.
Shane Long is replacing Moussa Djenepo for the home team.
In the minute 73, Man Utd have been awarded a corner by Jon Moss.
Jon Moss signals a Man Utd throw-in in Southampton's half.
Edinson Cavani equalizes with a header to make it 2-2.
In the minute 75, Throw-in for Man Utd in their own half.
Free kick for Man Utd in the half of Southampton.
Free kick for Southampton in their own half.
In the minute 78, Southampton awarded a free kick in their own half.
Southampton are coming forward and Che Adams gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Man Utd have a goal kick.
In the minute 79, Free kick for Southampton in their own half.
Jon Moss signals a free kick to Man Utd in their own half.
Free kick for Southampton in their own half.
In the minute 84, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Ole Gunnar Solskjaer is making the team's third substitution at St. Mary's Stadium with Brandon Williams replacing Alex Telles.
Southampton have a goal kick.
In the minute 86, Jon Moss signals a free kick to Southampton.
Corner awarded to Man Utd.
Can Man Utd capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Southampton's half?
In the minute 89, Man Utd have been awarded a corner by Jon Moss.
Free kick Man Utd.
Man Utd are pushing forward but Bruno Fernandes's finish is wide of the goal.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Southampton.
At St. Mary's Stadium the fourth official shows that 5 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Free kick for Southampton in the half of Man Utd.
In Southampton a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Man Utd's Bruno Fernandes breaks free at St. Mary's Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Jon Moss awards Southampton a goal kick.
Throw-in for Southampton in the half of Man Utd.
Full-time! The final score is 2-3.
Southampton make their second substitution with Ibrahima Diallo replacing Stuart Armstrong.
Man Utd move into a 2-3 lead through a Edinson Cavani header.
Great play from Marcus Rashford to set up the goal.
The home team replace Kyle Walker-Peters with Daniel N`Lundulu.
